nation.england.name: England
nation.england.desc: A maritime kingdom with strong diplomacy.
nation.france.name: France
nation.france.desc: A powerful kingdom known for its military might.
nation.hre.name: Holy Roman Empire
nation.hre.desc: A complex realm with intricate politics.
nation.castile.name: Castile
nation.castile.desc: A devout kingdom focused on religion and expansion.
nation.ottoman.name: Ottoman Empire
nation.ottoman.desc: A vast empire with thriving trade and war.
trait.just.title: Just
trait.just.desc: Fair and righteous, you earn legitimacy easily but struggle with ruthless decisions.
trait.cruel.title: Cruel
trait.cruel.desc: Feared by many, your harsh choices increase stability but lower diplomacy.
trait.devout.title: Devout
trait.devout.desc: Religion guides you; clergy love you, merchants less so.
trait.diplomat.title: Diplomat
trait.diplomat.desc: You excel at negotiations but your army suffers from your pacifism.
trait.ambitious.title: Ambitious
trait.ambitious.desc: Always aiming higher, you seek conquests though risk overextension.
action.raise_taxes.title: Raise Taxes
action.raise_taxes.desc: Increase taxation to boost gold at the risk of legitimacy.
action.lower_taxes.title: Lower Taxes
action.lower_taxes.desc: Reduce taxes to appease the people but earn less gold.
action.invest_infrastructure.title: Invest in Infrastructure
action.invest_infrastructure.desc: Spend gold to improve the realm and gain long-term benefits.
action.host_feast.title: Host a Feast
action.host_feast.desc: Throw a grand feast to increase legitimacy and diplomacy.
action.recruit_troops.title: Recruit Troops
action.recruit_troops.desc: Spend gold to raise military strength.
action.train_army.title: Train the Army
action.fortify_border.title: Fortify the Border
action.fortify_border.desc: Invest in fortifications to prepare for invasions.
action.propose_alliance.title: Propose Alliance
action.propose_alliance.desc: Reach out diplomatically to form an alliance.
action.send_gift.title: Send Gift
action.send_gift.desc: Send a lavish gift to improve relations.
action.declare_war.title: Declare War
action.sign_trade_route.title: Sign Trade Route
action.sign_trade_route.desc: Open lucrative trade to increase gold and diplomacy.
action.host_tournament.title: Host Tournament
action.host_tournament.desc: Organize games to boost legitimacy and military morale.
action.pass_law.title: Pass Law
action.pass_law.desc: Introduce reforms to increase stability or freedom.
action.spy_on_nobles.title: Spy on Nobles
action.sabotage_enemy.title: Sabotage Enemy
action.arrange_marriage.title: Arrange Marriage
action.arrange_marriage.desc: Create a political marriage to secure alliances.
action.hold_court.title: Hold Court
action.hold_court.desc: Meet subjects and address grievances to boost legitimacy.
action.suppress_revolt.title: Suppress Revolt
action.suppress_revolt.desc: Use military force to quell an uprising.
action.fund_clergy.title: Fund Clergy
action.fund_clergy.desc: Donate to the church to increase legitimacy and diplomacy.
action.explore_new_land.title: Explore New Land
action.explore_new_land.desc: Send explorers to find new opportunities.
event.succession.title: The King's Illness
event.succession.text: The King has fallen gravely ill. Courtiers whisper about the succession. How will you prepare?
event.succession.choice1: Prepare the heir with counsel and training.
event.succession.choice2: Consolidate your own power and marginalize rivals.
event.revolt.title: Peasants Revolt
event.revolt.text: Oppressed peasants rise up, waving torches and pitchforks. They demand justice.
event.court_meeting.title: Council's Request
event.court_meeting.text: Your council requests you to approve a controversial law. How will you decide?
event.court_meeting.choice1: Approve the law to strengthen your rule.
event.court_meeting.choice2: Reject the law to avoid unrest.
event.war.title: Threat of Invasion
event.war.text: A neighboring kingdom threatens war. Do you prepare for battle?
event.war.choice1: Mobilize your army and meet them on the field.
event.trade.title: Merchant Guild Proposal
event.trade.text: Merchants propose a new trade route that could enrich your kingdom but anger rivals.
event.trade.choice1: Accept the trade route and prosper.
event.diplomacy.title: Offer of Alliance
event.diplomacy.text: A rival nation offers an alliance. Do you accept their offer?
event.tax.title: Tax Collection
event.tax.text: Your treasury advisers urge you to collect overdue taxes from nobles.
event.tax.choice2: Let them keep their wealth to maintain loyalty.
event.market.title: Market Boom
event.market.text: The markets are booming due to increased trade. How do you leverage this?
event.market.choice2: Encourage free trade to keep commerce thriving.
event.conspiracy.title: Conspiracy Uncovered
event.conspiracy.text: Your spies uncover a plot against you by a faction. How will you respond?
event.conspiracy.choice2: Use the information to blackmail them.
event.tournament.title: Grand Tournament
event.tournament.text: Knights are eager to compete in a grand tournament. Shall you host it?
event.tournament.choice1: Host the tournament to boost morale.
ending.victory_diplomatic.title: Diplomatic Triumph
ending.victory_diplomatic.text: Through your silver tongue and strategic alliances, your reign ends in lasting peace and prosperity.
ending.victory_military.title: Conquering Hero
ending.victory_military.text: Your armies crushed all foes, unifying realms under your glorious banner.
ending.victory_economic.title: Golden Age
ending.victory_economic.text: Your stewardship ushered in a golden age of wealth and cultural flourishing.
ending.overthrow.title: Overthrown
ending.overthrow.text: Your misrule led to your downfall as disgruntled nobles deposed you.
ending.bankrupt.title: Bankruptcy
ending.bankrupt.text: Crushing debt and famine devastated your kingdom, forcing abdication.
ending.war_loss.title: Defeat in War
ending.war_loss.text: Your armies were decimated and your lands seized; you are forced into exile.
event.prince.tutor.title: Lessons at Court
event.prince.tutor.text: As prince, you must decide what to focus on in your studies.
event.prince.hunt.title: Royal Hunt
event.prince.hunt.text: During a royal hunt, you encounter a wounded deer.
event.prince.hunt.choice2: Finish the deer off, proving your strength.
event.prince.study.title: Studies and Faith
event.prince.study.text: Your tutors ask whether you want to learn economics or theology.
event.prince.dissent.title: Murmurs of Dissent
event.prince.dissent.text: Whispers among servants hint at dissatisfaction with the current rule.
event.prince.dissent.choice2: Dismiss the murmurs as petty gossip.
